mapper.select: select count(m_idx) from tb_member where m_kakaoemail=#{m_kakaoemail}
select count(m_idx) from tb_member where m_naveremail=#{m_naveremail}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_member (m_username, m_naveremail, m_kakaoemail, m_ssn1, m_ssn2, m_hp) values (#{m_username}, #{m_naveremail}, #{m_kakaoemail}, #{m_ssn1}, #{m_ssn2}, #{m_hp})
mapper.select: select m_idx, m_username from tb_member where m_kakaoemail=#{m_kakaoemail}
select m_idx, m_username from tb_member where m_naveremail=#{m_naveremail}
